ygData.subject: Re: bard mail delivery quest
ygData.msgSnippet: The text is bugged, not the quest.  The pouch goes to the two ton guy in Freeport, Felisity gets only letters.  He will reward you. Kitasi of E ci ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
The text is bugged, not the quest. The pouch goes to the two ton guy in
Freeport, Felisity gets only letters. He will reward you.

Kitasi of E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: cotto004 [mailto:cotto004@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 11:37 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] bard mail delivery quest


From: cotto004 <cotto004@...>

Has anyone else been doing the mail delivery quest? When I deliver mail
from
Kelethin to Freeport it doesn't work, but going the other way (Freeport to
Kelethin) it works fine. Here is what I am doing. Idia in Kelethin gives
me
a mail pouch and tells me to take it to Felisity Starbright in Freeport. I
do
that, but nothing happens. Is this a bug? Does it happen to everyone, or
just me? Am I doing something wrong?

Lanye
Wood Elf Bard
Fennin Ro
